episodes.title: 169: Mormon Mystery: What Happened to Steven Koecher?
episodes.description: LDS member Steven Koecher has been missing since 2009. In this episode, we discuss the events surrounding his disappearance and theories about what potentially happened to Steven. Disclaimer: This podcast is for entertainment purposes only. Steven Koecher was 30 years old when he went missing in 2009. He has blonde hair and blue eyes, and at the time of his disappearance he was 5 feet 10 inches tall and weighed 180 pounds. He has a birthmark on his abdomen and a surgical scar behind each ear. When last seen, he was wearing a white button-down shirt, jeans or Dockers, and white sneakers. If you have any information about Steven, please contact the St. George Police Department at 435–627–4300.
